title: Looking to make a team. High Silver/Gold players. Also wanting a coach, or an analyzer.
body:
Hello ! ( If you are interested in the coaching / analyzer position, please be high plat or above, and go to the bottom of the post for the info (: )

I am currently taking applications for the ranked team called "Doozy Gaming".

A little about myself. 

I main ADC. I'm a 19 year old student, and started playing at the end of season 1.

As of right now, applications are open for **ALL** roles except **ADC**
Times for practice will be decided when everyone is on the team, it is requested you can make it at least five days a week, more than five would be great as well. Please have Curse Voice as well.

As with everything there are rules, most are basic, don't be a jerk, don't flame.
Below are specific rules, as well as the application to fill out and post.

* Don't be rude to your team, seriously, it's already a 5v5 don't make it a 6v4.
* If you, or someone on the team messes up, then so be it, learn from it for the next time you're in that match up, or the next time you're in that position.
* If you need to give someone constructive criticism, do it* AFTER* the game is over. Do not make a big deal about it in game. Wait.
* Really, don't be a jerk.


Application:

IGN:
Rank:
Role:
Best Champions In Role:
Time Zone:
Curse Voice?:
What Should I Know About You?:
What Is Your Play Style?:
Anything Else You Want To Say?:


After you have replied to this post with the filled out application, add me.  Thank you everyone for reading GLHV!  (People interested in coaching/analyzing read on!)




Hello ! 

If you are interested in coaching, or analyzing our games, please, please send me a friend request, along with a message telling me you're interested. 

I can send replays of our games, talks with the team, whatever you like.

Message for more details. Thanks!

replies.body:
IGN: 7heDubz

Rank: Silver 3 (constantly in and out of promos)

Role: Support/Off-Adc

Best Champions In Role: Leona, Blitzcrank, Thresh Soraka(In that order) / Caitlyn, Jinx, Sivir (in that order)

Time Zone: Eastern Time

Curse Voice?: I do indeed have this. As well as a headset, No need to hear my game AND me.

What Should I Know About You?: Very tolerant and accepting of others. Always try to find a way to blame myself for my deaths and teammates deaths in order to better myself.

What Is Your Play Style?: I like to play aggressively as a tankier support but I am very malleable in play style.

Anything Else You Want To Say?: I've been looking to try and get a group of friends together so that I can get higher and higher in ranings and skill but Don't have enough that play league as often as I do.

Oh and I hope you at least give me the chance to support you in a couple normal games =)

IGN: ImTryingToLearn
Rank: Gold IV (I can play mid at a plat level)
Role: Midlane
Best Champions In Role: Zed, Syndra, Ahri, Xerath, LeBlanc. (Can play almost anything)
Time Zone: Central
Curse Voice?: Have but would prefer another voice comm.
What Should I Know About You?: Always want to win and get better.
What Is Your Play Style?: Prefer quick/pick playstyle but I play all roles well.
Anything Else You Want To Say?: I can play in a shot caller role or anything that benefits the team

IGN: SLeogue712
Rank: Silver III
Role: Mid
Best Champions in Role: Orianna, Fizz, Syndra, Zilean
Time Zone: EST
Curse Voice: Yes
What Should I Know About You?: I never rage at teammates or anything and for the most part am very positive
What is Your Play Style: Passive Farm Lane for the most part, and can be aggressive if I see fit.
Anything Else?: Lets have some fun

IGN: ISIS Member (changing this weekend)
Rank: Silver 4
Role: Support
Best Champions In Role: Thresh, Leo, Braum, Zyra
Time Zone: Eastern
Curse Voice?: Skype boiiiiiiii
What Should I Know About You?: I'm loud
What Is Your Play Style?: Kills or gtfo
Anything Else You Want To Say?: I like getting carries fed

IGN: Rainshattered
Rank: Silver I
Role: Support
Best Champions In Role: Braum, Leona, Nami, Soraka, and Sona, but I can play others as well.
Time Zone: Central.
Curse Voice?: Yes.
What Should I Know About You?: I am looking for a serious team in which I can improve my play style, but I am also looking for a group of people that I can have fun with while we play. 
What Is Your Play Style?: I prefer to capitalize on the enemy's team mistakes. 
Anything Else You Want To Say?: I am very free right now, so there's not much to be concerned about when it comes to practice times with me. I've also sent you a friend request!
